column4: Simple question. If I'm not on linux, is it possible for me to uncompress *.deb?
you won't be running gnome so it should use fewer resources
But I'm not on linux. I can't uncompress it. It recognize it as a Debian binary format. :)
I'll deal with it later when Im on linux. Nom nom nom.
rename it to tar.gz  and retry
windows is dumb and uses the file extension STILL
OSX. Heh. tar.gz didn't do the trick. I ended up installing unp and it worked. ;0
does OSX have the ar command in terminal?
It does. I don't even know what that is for.
then you can run:  ar x filename     and extract the deb
